name: Disconnect (Mistodon)
description:
Disconnect is a game about long-distance relationships. Play as Lalo, a magician, and Senti, an otherworldly ghost-like person as they try to coordinate an adventure without even being able to see each other.

In battle, Lalo can support Senti with magic, while Senti possesses enemies to turn them against each other.

Controls

  • Enter / Space = Confirm, Switch to Senti, Possess
  • Escape / Backspace = Cancel, Return to Lalo, Release possession
